title: KubeFleet: The Future of Multicluster Kubernetes App Management
author: Ryan Zhang
description: Using advanced scheduling, resource optimization and policy-based management, KubeFleet is designed to make multicluster Kubernetes management easier.
cntitle: KubeFleet：多集群 Kubernetes 应用管理的未来
cndescription: KubeFleet 旨在通过使用高级调度、资源优化和基于策略的管理，简化多集群 Kubernetes 管理。
